column2: All beta-lactams except those specifically licensed to treat infections caused by methicillin- resistant staphylococci expressing low affinity PBP2a
column3: all beta- lactams with recognised anti- staphylococcal activity
column4: penicillins apart from isoxazolyl-penicillins and combinations with beta-lactamase inhibitors

column5: A S if erythromycin AND clindamycin; NA
